languages.text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain Bayonet Strike melee single attack for 1 AP. This attack deals weapon damage and is not counted towards attack limit, but can only be used once per round.

traits.locale_text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
While the Astra Militarum Commander is under the Combined Arms effect, killing an enemy adjacent to any ally grants the ally an additional +10 Momentum.
While the Astra Militarum Commander is under the Combined Arms effect, killing an enemy adjacent to any ally grants that ally an additional +10 momentum.

While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, killing an enemy adjacent to any ally grants that ally an additional +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

Two-handed las weapon, equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies, gains a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals damage of the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Двуручное лазерное оружие, используемое командиром Астра Милитарум или его союзниками, получает способность {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Удар штыком{/g} — одиночную атаку {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} стоимостью 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Эта атака наносит урон, равный урону лазерного оружия, и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Может использоваться только 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: Two-handed las weapon, equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies, gains a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals damage of the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Это двуручное лазерное оружие, экипированное командиром Астра Милитарум или его союзниками, дает способность {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Удар штыком{/g} — одиночную атаку {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} стоимостью 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Эта атака наносит урон лазерным оружием и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Может использоваться только 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Когда командир Астра Милитарум под действием способности Совместные учения убивает противника, находящегося на соседней клетке с любым союзником командира, этот союзник получает +10 моментума.

Это двуручное лазерное оружие, экипированное командиром Астра Милитарум или его союзниками, дает способность {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Удар штыком{/g} — одиночную атаку {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} стоимостью 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Эта атака наносит урон лазерным оружием и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Может использоваться только 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Двуручное лазерное оружие, используемое командиром Астра Милитарум или его союзниками, получает способность {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Удар штыком{/g} — одиночную атаку {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} стоимостью 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Эта атака наносит урон, равный урону лазерного оружия, и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Может использоваться только 1 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: Vom Astra Militarum-Commander oder seinen Verbündeten ausgerüstete Zweihand-Laser-Waffen erhalten einen {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bajonetthieb{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, der 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet. Dieser Angriff verursacht denselben Schaden wie die Laser-Waffe. Sie fließt nicht in das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} ein, kann aber nur einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Vom Astra Militarum-Commander oder seinen Verbündeten ausgerüstete Zweihand-Laser-Waffen erhalten einen {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bajonetthieb{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, der 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet. Dieser Angriff verursacht denselben Schaden wie die Laser-Waffe. Sie fließt nicht in das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} ein, kann aber nur einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Les armes laser à deux mains dont sont équipés le commandant de l'Astra Militarum et ses alliés gagnent un {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}coup de baïonnette{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} unique) qui coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cette attaque inflige la même quantité de dégâts que l'arme laser et n'est pas déduite du {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}nombre maximum d'attaques par tour{/g}, mais elle n'est disponible qu'une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les armes laser à deux mains dont sont équipés le commandant de l'Astra Militarum et ses alliés gagnent un {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}coup de baïonnette{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} unique) qui coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cette attaque inflige la même quantité de dégâts que l'arme laser et n'est pas déduite du {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}nombre maximum d'attaques par tour{/g}, mais elle n'est disponible qu'une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 星界军指挥官及其盟友装备的双手激光武器获得{g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}刺刀突击{/g}能力。此能力为单体{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。此次攻击造成的伤害与激光武器的伤害相同，且不计入每回合{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻击次数上限{/g}，但每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用一次。
languages.original_text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 星界军指挥官及其盟友装备的双手激光武器获得{g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}刺刀突击{/g}能力。此能力为单体{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。此次攻击造成的伤害与激光武器的伤害相同，且不计入每回合{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻击次数上限{/g}，但每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中只能使用一次。

languages.text: Las armas láser a dos manos usadas por el comandante del Astra Militarum y sus aliados ganan un único {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Golpe de bayoneta{/g} que cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Este ataque inflige el mismo daño que el arma láser y no cuenta para el {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}límite de ataques por turno{/g}, pero solo puede efectuarse una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Las armas láser a dos manos usadas por el comandante del Astra Militarum y sus aliados ganan un único {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Golpe de bayoneta{/g} que cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Este ataque inflige el mismo daño que el arma láser y no cuenta para el {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}límite de ataques por turno{/g}, pero solo puede efectuarse una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

Mientras el comandante del Astra Militarum se beneficia de los efectos de Tácticas de regimiento, matar a cualquier enemigo adyacente a un aliado proporciona a ese aliado +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.

languages.text: 帝国防衛軍司令またはその味方が装備している両手用のレーザー武器は、1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費して使用できる{g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}銃剣攻撃{/g}の単発{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を得る。この攻撃はレーザー武器と同じダメージを与え、{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻撃制限{/g}には含まれないが、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}につき1回しか使用できない。
languages.original_text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 帝国防衛軍司令が連携軍隊効果を受けている時、いずれかの味方に隣接している敵を撃破時、その味方の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を+10する。

languages.text: Astra Militarum komutanının veya dost birimlerinin kuşandığı çift el lazer silahları, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli olan bir {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Süngü Darbesi{/g} tek {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} kazanırlar. Bu saldırı, lazer silahı ile aynı hasarı verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ancak her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} yalnızca bir kez kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text: Two-handed las weapons equipped by the Astra Militarum commander or their allies gain a {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Bayonet Strike{/g} single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This attack deals the same damage as the las weapon and does not count towards the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but can only be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Astra Militarum komutanının veya dost birimlerinin kuşandığı çift el lazer silahları, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli olan bir {g|f:7ae09bd99a7f4fa8842d64fb001af19b}Süngü Darbesi{/g} tek {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} kazanırlar. Bu saldırı, lazer silahı ile aynı hasarı verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ancak her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} yalnızca bir kez kullanılabilir.
